title: ArchiCORE | Intelligent Controller for Architectural & Facade Lighting by DITRA
description:
Lighting a landmark? You’ll need more than good fixtures. ArchiCORE is the intelligent core of your architectural lighting system — built for projects that demand reliability, precision, and seamless control. 

Where ArchiCORE shines: 
- Facade lighting for commercial and public buildings 
- Urban landmarks and heritage sites 
- Museums, hotels, and cultural venues 
- Projects with large-scale lighting grids and complex zoning 

What makes it powerful: 
- 2048 DMX channels for large-scale, multi-zone lighting control
- Galvanically isolated DMX with RDM for safe, two-way communication 
- Real-time scene adjustments for dynamic lighting scenarios 
- Integrated GSM modem for remote access and diagnostics 
- GPS & astronomical clock for precise, location-based scheduling 
- RS-485 interface for direct sensor and meter integration 
- LED indicators for instant fault detection across all interfaces 

Whether you're illuminating a skyline or syncing light with city rhythms — ArchiCORE gives you total control. Smart lighting starts with the right core — ArchiCORE by DITRA. 

More details here: https://ditra-solutions.com/products/ArchiCore

#ArchitecturalLighting #FacadeLighting #LandmarkLighting #SmartLighting #LightingControl #DMX  #SmartCityLighting

title: ArtGate Prime Lighting Control | Reliable ArtNet/sACN to DMX Converter for Show Lighting
description:
ArtGate Prime – lighting control for shows, studios & theme parks https://ditra-solutions.com/products/ArtGatePrime

ArtGate Prime is a dedicated ArtNet/sACN to DMX/RDM gateway, designed for projects where reliable protocol conversion and precise timing are critical.
The unit receives control data over Ethernet and outputs it as multiple isolated DMX universes, ensuring accurate, real-time control of large fixture groups.

Built on a robust hardware platform, ArtGate Prime is optimized for demanding environments such as live shows, studios, clubs and theme parks, where network-based control must integrate seamlessly with standard DMX devices.

Technical highlights:
- ArtNet and sACN input over Ethernet (RJ‑45)
- Multiple DMX/RDM outputs with electrical isolation
- Real-time data conversion with frame-accurate synchronization
- Compact form factor suitable for touring racks and permanent installations

For specifications or integration support, contact our team.

#LightingControl #ArtNet #sACN #DMX #RDM #StageLighting #EntertainmentLighting #ShowContro

title: Smart Lighting Nodes | NEMA, Zhaga, PLC
description:
With DITRA Lighting Control Nodes, you are never locked into a single communication standard. Our nodes support DALI, DALI 2.0, PWM, 1–10V, and 0–10V right out of the box — giving you full freedom to design, retrofit, and upgrade your lighting projects.

Perfect for street lighting and smart city applications, where long-term savings in time, effort, and budget matter.

Learn more here: https://ditra-solutions.com/street-city/products/category/LuminaireControllers

title: Wire Daylight Sensor for Smart Street Lighting | DITRA Solutions
description:
This compact sensor tracks real-time ambient light and switches the lighting on or off based on actual conditions — not fixed schedules. Cloudy weather? Early dusk? It reacts instantly, helping maintain comfort and safety while reducing unnecessary energy use.

Cost-effective from the start
You don’t need one sensor per luminaire. Simply connect a single sensor to the cabinet — and you have a smart, daylight-driven system with minimal hardware.

Perfect for street lighting, smart cities, and energy-saving projects. 
Learn more: https://www.ditra-solutions.com/products/WireDaylightSensor

#lightingcontrol  #DaylightSensor #smartlighting  #streetlighting  #energyefficiency  #smartcity  #lightingtechnology

title: DITRA CORE PRO-2 | Intelligent Lighting Control for Smart Cities
description:
DITRA CORE PRO-2 — the brain of your lighting control system.

This DIN-rail-mounted controller is designed to serve as the central intelligence hub for managing and monitoring all equipment inside a lighting control cabinet — from magnetic starters to networked sensors and DITRA modules.

⚙️ Key capabilities:
- Dual communication: RS-485 + CAN for robust device-level control
- Cellular (2G/3G/4G) or Ethernet connectivity to DITRA’s server
- Built-in GPS for time sync and geolocation
- Operates on 110/220V AC or 9–36V DC
- Local setup via DIP switches / full remote config via the DITRA platform

Ideal for smart cities, intelligent road infrastructure, and complex hybrid lighting control systems.

#SmartLighting #StreetLighting #LightingControl #SmartCity #LightingTechnology #IoTLighting #Infrastructure #SmartStreetLighting

title: ✨ Ditra Solutions at Light + Intelligent Building Middle East 2025 | Event Highlights ✨
description:
Join us as we showcase Ditra Solutions at Light + Intelligent Building Middle East 2025 in Dubai! 🌟

This exhibition was a fantastic opportunity to connect with industry leaders, explore cutting-edge innovations, and present our high-quality outdoor lighting solutions. From smart wired and wireless controlled outdoor lighting to customized architectural illumination, we had insightful discussions with potential partners and industry professionals.

🚀 Highlights of our participation:
✅ Networking with 80+ key contacts
✅ Showcasing our latest outdoor lighting technologies
✅ Exploring new trends in intelligent lighting and smart control systems

A big thank you to everyone who visited our booth! If you missed us at the event, feel free to reach out on our website or in the comments below.

🔔 Subscribe to our channel for more updates on innovative lighting solutions and future exhibitions!
